name: Maryam Usman
role: Behavioral Health Specialist | Mental Wellness Advocate
bio: Maryam Usman is a Behavioral Health Specialist passionate about mental wellness, empathy, and community recovery. As one of the Consultancy Firmâ€™s most creative young professionals, she blends evidence-based mental-health practice with cultural understanding to help communities heal and grow. Her work focuses on emotional literacy, youth resilience, and family-based therapy initiatives across Nigeria.

cards.title: Core Expertise
cards.content: Behavioral therapy, stress management, trauma support, and emotional intelligence training.

cards.title: Community Programs
cards.content: Facilitates workshops on mental resilience for women and adolescents; designed peer-support circles for youth centers.

cards.title: Professional Vision
cards.content: To establish a nationwide mental-health education network where wellness is viewed as strength and self-leadership.
